title: 820-4924-A - Chimes but NO VIDEO
message:
The board is pretty clean, no liquid damage at all. However, i don't have any video (even external).
I have mouse light and chime.
I feel pretty lost and I'm sure you guys can help me out.

Thank you

title: 820-4924-A - Chimes but NO VIDEO
message: Any history of drop damage etc? Tried external with internal screen disconnected?

title: 820-4924-A - Chimes but NO VIDEO
message: No drop history and no external video.

title: 820-4924-A - Chimes but NO VIDEO
message:
You didn't confirm if tested external video disconnecting internal LCD.

Please confirm USB activity with OSX pendrive.

You should get 5V at L8300 in the first 1-2s, even without LCD connected.
If LCD is connected, then LCD_HPD_CONN should rise to 2.5V at same time.

title: 820-4924-A - Chimes but NO VIDEO
message:
External works great!
L8300 Without the screen, gave me 2.9V and drop to 2.1V and stays like that.

title: 820-4924-A - Chimes but NO VIDEO
message: Post U8300 voltages at the same time.

title: 820-4924-A - Chimes but NO VIDEO
message:
U8300
Pin 4 = 5V and others pins = 0
I replaced and works !

Thank you for the hint!
